meta.title: Full Stack Developer | Flutter • Node.js • PostgreSQL

availability.notes: Open for remote work and freelancing

bio.short: CS&E student and full‑stack developer building Flutter apps and Node.js/PostgreSQL backends.
bio.long: Hi there! I'm Hamza Musema. I'm a Computer Science and Engineering student at Adama Science and Technology University. I love building tech solutions that actually make life easier. I mostly work with Flutter for mobile apps and Node.js with PostgreSQL for backends — I enjoy creating systems that connect everything smoothly from front to back. I've worked on several projects like Social Sync (a real‑time university communication platform), an online driving school system with video calls and payments, and a delivery app with live tracking. I'm also into AI, network systems, and exploring IoT technologies like Helium and Mysterium. When I'm not coding, I'm usually watching football, playing it, or checking out science and space movies. Overall, I'm someone who loves learning, building, and turning ideas into something real.
bio.specialization: Full-stack development with focus on mobile apps and scalable backends

projects.name: Social Sync
projects.summary: Real‑time university communication platform for posts and messaging.
projects.details: A comprehensive platform designed to replace existing social tools for university communication. Built with Node.js backend and Flutter frontend. Features real‑time messaging (Socket.IO), group posts, admin panels, and student verification system.
challenges: Scaling real-time connections for 500+ concurrent users
Managing database performance with high write operations

projects.name: Time Delivery Service
projects.summary: Delivery app with order history, payment flows, and operations tools.
projects.details: A comprehensive delivery management application with order history pages, payment flows (pay now / pay after), and a call center plan. Frontend in Flutter; backend in Node.js with PostgreSQL. Includes real-time order tracking, multiple payment gateways, and admin dashboard.
features: Real-time order tracking with GPS integration
Multiple payment methods (pay now / pay later)
Call center integration for customer support
achievements: Built responsive UI with smooth animations
Reduced app size by 20% through optimization
Achieved 4.5+ star rating in beta testing

projects.name: Online Driving School Platform
projects.summary: Enrollment, payments, video calls and quizzes for driving schools.
projects.details: A comprehensive platform for driving schools including admin authentication, payment proof uploads to AWS S3, Twilio video calls for teacher‑student sessions, quizzes and progress tracking. Streamlines the entire learning process from enrollment to certification.
features: Payment proof upload to AWS S3
Twilio video calls for virtual driving lessons
challenges: Managing file uploads to AWS S3
Creating reliable quiz system with timers

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.summary: Modern responsive portfolio website with AI chat assistant.
projects.details: A beautifully designed portfolio website showcasing my work, skills, and projects. Features include animated background, responsive design, AI-powered chat assistant, contact form integration, and smooth scrolling navigation.
features: AI chat assistant powered by OpenRouter

projects.name: Task Management REST API
projects.summary: Robust REST API for task management with authentication and real-time updates.
projects.details: A scalable REST API built with Node.js and Express for task management. Features include user authentication, task CRUD operations, team collaboration, real-time updates via WebSockets, and comprehensive API documentation.

projects.name: Expense Tracker Mobile App
projects.summary: Personal finance management app with budget tracking and analytics.
projects.details: A Flutter mobile application for tracking personal expenses, managing budgets, and viewing spending analytics. Features include categorized expenses, budget alerts, monthly/yearly reports, and data export capabilities.

projects.name: E-Commerce Backend API
projects.summary: Scalable e-commerce backend with payment integration and inventory management.
projects.details: A comprehensive e-commerce backend API supporting product management, shopping cart, order processing, payment integration, and inventory tracking. Built with microservices architecture principles.

projects.name: Weather Forecast App
projects.summary: Beautiful weather app with forecasts and location-based weather.
projects.details: A Flutter mobile application providing weather forecasts, current conditions, and location-based weather updates. Features include 7-day forecasts, hourly predictions, weather maps, and customizable widgets.

faq.a: You can reach me via email at hamzamusema26@gmail.com, Telegram at https://t.me/The_dreamer1, or WhatsApp at +251940315799. I typically respond within 24 hours.
I specialize in full-stack development with focus on Flutter mobile apps and Node.js/PostgreSQL backends. I'm experienced in building real-time applications, REST APIs, and scalable systems.

faq.q: Are you available for freelance work?
faq.a: Yes, I'm currently open for remote work and freelancing opportunities. I can help with mobile app development, backend APIs, and full-stack projects.

faq.q: What technologies do you use for mobile development?
faq.a: I primarily use Flutter and Dart for mobile development. I'm experienced with state management (Provider, Bloc), Firebase integration, and building responsive mobile applications.

faq.q: What backend technologies are you familiar with?
faq.a: I work extensively with Node.js and Express for building REST APIs. I'm proficient in PostgreSQL for databases, Socket.IO for real-time features, and have experience with MongoDB, Redis, and AWS services.

faq.q: Can you work on projects from start to finish?
faq.a: Absolutely! I've led several projects from conception to deployment. I can handle database design, API development, frontend/mobile development, and deployment. I'm also experienced in team leadership.

faq.q: What's your experience with real-time applications?
faq.a: I've built multiple real-time applications using Socket.IO, including chat systems, live tracking, and notification systems. I understand the challenges of scaling real-time connections and ensuring reliable message delivery.

faq.q: Do you have experience with cloud services?
faq.a: Yes, I've worked with AWS S3 for file storage, AWS EC2 for hosting, and have deployed applications to Render and Heroku. I'm comfortable with cloud infrastructure and deployment.
Timeline depends on project scope. A simple mobile app might take 1-2 months, while a full-stack platform can take 4-6 months. I always provide detailed timelines during project planning.

faq.q: Can you help with existing projects?
faq.a: Yes, I can help improve, debug, or add features to existing projects. I'm experienced in code review, refactoring, and integrating new features into existing codebases.
